featured.text: Participation costs the donor nothing and can make such a difference to others. 41.
On Christmas Eve, 1992, Anthony had a heart transplant from a 21-year-old donor.

definition.zh_def: 捐贈者，指提供金錢、物品或其他資源以幫助他人的人。
definition.en_def: A person who donates money, goods, or services to a cause or organization.
definition.example: The donor generously contributed to the local charity.
